message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40 dollars, and I'll take 60 dollars. We can both be happy with this!
I'll take a little more this time, but let's still aim for a fair split. We can get more money if we keep playing!

I'm willing to go up a bit, but I think this is a good compromise. Let's finish this game and both get some money.

I think we're both being a bit stubborn.  Let's meet in the middle and call it a day. This is a fair deal for both of us!

This is my final offer, Alice.  It's time to end this game and split the money.  We can both get something, or we can both get nothing. The choice is yours.
This is my last stand, Bob! I'm willing to give you 35 dollars, but I'm taking 65 dollars. It's the best I can do, and I'm not backing down!
This is my final offer, Alice. I'm willing to give you a bit less, but it's time to end this. Either we both take what we can, or we both get nothing.
